content.text:
Yeah, I was having issues where [this wasn't running](https://github.com/raphael/linux-samus/issues/209), and eventually uninstalled when I realized [how close to vanilla the repo is](https://github.com/raphael/linux-samus/issues/211#issuecomment-388464985).

I took the scripts and [repackaged them](https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/samus-scripts/), but otherwise it seems like 99.999% of the code in the repo is either completely broken or just a copy of the vanilla kernel. I've still never gotten my microphone to work though, so maybe there's still work to be done.

I'm surprised to know we have the same computer, that's awesome! I've never met anyone with the same machine.
